tool_description: RChilli Search & Match API allows you to search and match candidates and jobs with great relevancy and accuracy than simple database searching and matching algorithms.
name: RChilli Search and Match
title: RChilli Search and Match

api_list.name: Analyze
api_list.description: The Analyze query is an extension of the Simple Search. It analyzes the search string and brings out all the search keywords separately for a more refined result of your query in a simple search.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/analyze"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Boolean Search
api_list.description:
In the boolean search you can customize your search by specifying search parameters like - Job Profile, Company, Degree, etc.

Boolean Search gives more flexibility in searching by specifying required/optional search parameters. You can search values for multiple fields with multiple values. Multiple values are searched based on the OR conditions. Multiple Fields are searched in the required conditions on the basis of AND condition while in the optional condition it is search with OR condition.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/booleanSearch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/booleanSearch"

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Match with ID
api_list.description:
This API find Resumes/Job descriptions matching your input documents ID's.

There are four types of matching cases as follows:

1. Resume to Resume: Get resumes from the index which matches the input resume.
2. Resume to JD: Get Job Descriptions from the index which matches the input resume.
3. JD to JD: Get Job Descriptions from the index which matches the input Job Descriptions.
4. JD To Resume: Get resumes from the index which matches with input Job Descriptions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/matchWithId"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/matchWithId"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Parse and Index
api_list.description: To search resume's and JD's using RChilli Search and Match API, you require to parse the resume/JD and index them. The indexing provides operations for managing the indexes. This includes adding and updating the index as well as removing from it and rebuilding it.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/parseAndIndex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Simple Search
api_list.description: The Simple Search API method empowers you to make your document searchable with a string query without specifying search parameters. In Simple Search API call, you get candidates - Score (out of 100), FullName, CurrentJobProfile, CurrentEmployer, TotalExperienceInYear, City, State, Country, id (Index).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com/simpleSearch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-search-and-match.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: One To One Match

Resume to Resume: Get resumes from the index which matches the input resume.
Resume to JD: Get Job Descriptions from the index which matches the input resume.
